guide.introduction:
While working on a "Haunted House" for a party at my daughter's school, I picked up a rubber heart at a local dollar store for use as one of the decorations.

While unwrapping the "heart", I squeezed it a few times while thinking "it sure would be neat if I could make it actually look like it was beating."

It was a simple matter to hook it up to an old electric breast pump. While it looked "okay" just laying out on the table beating away, I decided to put the heart in a plastic jar along with a bit of "blood."

When I turned on the pump, we were able to watch a "realistic" heart beat away!
